Erin Hastings and I have been leading a team of students for some time
on t=
he problem of automated content generation in video games through
evolution=
ary algorithms.  We're not quite at the release stage, but
some of you may =
be interested to see what we're working on:  It's a
multiplayer space shoot=
er called Galactic Arms Race (GAR) that
continually produces new kinds of w=
eapons based on the weapons people
have liked in the past.  Weapons in GAR =
are particle systems that are
controlled by CPPNs evolved with NEAT.  

You=
 can see some screenshots and other information here:

http://gar.eecs.ucf.=
edu/

ken
